name: Macdows 95
summary:
An absurd puzzle game with lots of parody and satire running on an imaginary operating system.

what awaits you in this game;
- puzzles
- more puzzles
- good jokes (also some bad jokes)
- AI & and a robot
- dark humour
- much more puzzles
- parody and satire (still I don't know the difference between them)
- single eyes
- riddles & hidden messages
